translations: vt.当……的教母；作……的女监护人

phrs.translation: n. 充当临死孩童教母的仙女

sentences.sentence: I have two godmothers, because is always busy studying, I don't have time to see them usually.
sentences.translation: 我有两个干妈，因为我平时总是忙于学业，很少去看望她们，只有逢年过节才聚上一次。

sentences.sentence: And, who says we don't have fairy godmothers? In the 21st century we call them doctors, stylist, and even designers.
sentences.translation: 谁说没有魔法仙子，只不过在21实际我们称之为医生，时尚达人，甚至也可以是设计师。
